ygData.subject: Re: Dawn on a New Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: From the somewhere or another amid the rubble, a small head poked her way out of the rubble before pulling herself out. A plushie was clutched tightly in her

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

From the somewhere or another amid the rubble, a small head poked her way out 
of the rubble before pulling herself out. A plushie was clutched tightly in 
her tiny hand...not just any plushie of course. It was a cute little Megatron 
plushie. 

Clutching the plushie, a slight tear in its leg with a bit of stuffing coming 
out, the tiny bot wailed at the top of her little lungs. "MEGGY AN' ME GOTSA 
OWCHIEEEESSSSSS!!!!"

OOC: ^_^ Introducing...

NAME: Elephana (or course, because she hates the name, she has everyone call 
her Phanna. ^^;)

AFFILIATION: Maximal to the end! She wouldn't have it any other way!

FUNCTION: Communications (Tinkerer)

BEAST FORM: Elephant

TRANSMETAL/FUZOR/OTHER: Just a basic, cute lil elephant. ^_^

ROBOT FORM DESCRIPTION: @.@; Same as above.

BEAST FORM DESCRIPTION: A cute baby elephant with oversized ears and bright 
green eyes. 

WEAPONS/ABILITIES: She's armed and dangerous...with her handy water gun of 
death! XD Basically, she has toys and useless gadgets of all sorts that she 
would try to use as weapons if it came down to it!

HISTORY: Fresh offa Cybertron for this! ^_^ Had a normal life with normal 
parents...normal parents with some influence. That's the first of two reasons 
she was able to tag along on this. ^^;

Personality: Innocent beyond belief, and would have probably been considered 
far too young for space travel...IF she didn't have her 
smarter-than-average-for-someone-her-age thing going on, allowing her to find 
and eliminate more computer problems. ^^ She's immature, clingy, and tends to 
think of herself as the big strong elephant who shouldn't fear 
anything..unless she's facing an actual opponent rather than her little 
plushies, action figures, and other toys. Carries a stuffed animal around 
with her at all times, and won't leave the base unless she gets her Megatron 
stuffed toy. No one knows WHERE she got it, or WHY the heck she has it, but 
she adores it just the same. ^^; Talks quite often like a young child, only 
using advanced dialogue when going on about what's wrong with the computer. 


--part1_72.18d48e33.29b98a5b_boundary
